description: GuGuai Game Accelerator Installer - Network acceleration tool for gaming

script: # Extract embedded archive (SFX) using 7z to make this package portable

notes: This installer is treated as a SFX/installer archive and is extracted with 7zip to the app folder.
The package is made portable by extracting files rather than running the original installer.
If the main executable is under a subfolder after extraction, adjust the 'bin' path accordingly.
